msbt.message: This is going to sound REALLY WEIRD, but I totes just saw someone washed up on the shore!He looks like he's sleeping, so I tried to wake him up, but he didn't budge!Can somebody sleep through getting hit with a stick?<10_4 /> I mean POKED with a stick! ? Can you maybe try waking him up? Gently?<10_4 /> I mean, since a stick didn't work?

K.K. Slider is here! Today! HERE! On our island! TODAY!<10_4 /> K.K. SLIDER! TODAY! HERE!You have GOT to go! GOT! TO! He takes requests during his performance! REQUESTS!I was so excited last night I. Could. Not. Sleep!<10_4 /> SQUUUUEEEEE!
I heard Label is around today!I'm going to go over there and say, "Show meFASHION!" Then we'll see what goes down from there.

I heard Saharah is visiting today! That's sweet as a honeybee since I'm on a quest for the perfect rug.'K, there's a few things that make the perfect rug. One: it has to be big enough to roll around onTwo: it has to be cute, but classy trennndyyybut also have a sort of, you know, timeless charm.Ohmigosh! And it should glow in the dark! That would be le bonkers for dance practice, !

Oh! My! Gosh! I just saw that K.K. is doing a concert in front of Resident Services!When I hear his voice, I get SO EXCITED!!!Wait. Have you already requested a song, ? If you haven't, you have got to GO! <10_4 />NOW!
I heard Daisy Mae is here today!She has le amazing turnip-growing skills and is so fun to chat with. I'm always so happy to see her!
Don't freak out, but I heard there's a sketchy ship on the north shore.It's, like, suspicious, but also intriguing! Oh, who am I kidding. I LOVE that sort of thing.

This is going to sound kind of crazy but I can feel, like, this presence It's totally spooky business It's like that TV show I used to watch that was all about ghosts and stuff It was called "Ghosts 'n Stuff."! Can you pretty please find out what's happening?! Is it GHOSTS? Or is it STUFF?!
! Have you already checked out K.K.'s birthday show? It's a glam event just. For. You. Ohmigosh, you TOTES need to go if you haven't already, !

Heeey, ! Have you gone to the plaza yet? K.K. is there right now!He's putting on a show for all the birthday peeps, but I bet we can watch too.Maybe if I tell him it's my birthday, he'll give me eyebrow-grooming tips. His look so silky smoooooth
Guess what, ! Mabel's here! She always brings the FABBEST of trendy outfits. I'm HYPE LEVEL 24 here! That's a whole level higher than my hype scale even goes, !
I just saw C.J.! I love bringing him fish. He's always so happy to see me.Or maybe he's just happy to see the fish!
Flick is here today. Have you met him yet, ? Flick is legit fab. Like, he's LICENSED to fab!Flick knows more about bugs than anybody else I know. Including me. And I know a lot about bugs. A. Lot.
Kicks is here today! A pair of his shoes can turn your foot fashion fabulous, fast! I've never worn shoes in my life. But if I did, I'd want fabulous fast foot fashion for sure, .

Ohmigosh! I just saw Celeste! I love to talk with her about the stars, !The billions of light-years between this island and those dots in the sky really put things in perspective.Now I know—if I work hard—I can be the MOST FAMOUS POP STAR for LIGHT-YEARS in every direction!

, do you believe inthe supernatural? I know. I know. It's SUCH a weird question. But, like, I keep hearing these hop-hop-hopping noises.They even go to a beat, you know like someone's practicing some super-fresh hippity hop moves. And every time I hear it, I feel totes possessed by this urge to dance! It's soooo sad, but I can't figure out who's doin' the groovin'. I'm dying to make them my backup dancer!

If you're an aspiring green thumb, you NEED to stop by Leif's pop-up shop in the plaza. Just make sure you have plenty of time to spend with him. He's not too familiar with the word "ASAP." Even though I said it to him, like, a trillion times.
Someone is totes conked out on the shore right now, and I THOUGHT it was someone I knew But, , the vibe is kindaoff.

I just saw that somebody is visiting our island! I think we're a tourist destination now, !I didn't say hi, though, because I was totes meditating. Kind of.<10_4 /> Fine. I was only THINKING about meditating I got distracted by the visitor.
